EmailTemplate.description: This template is for use during password resets or lost passwords for users of the partner portal
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Portal - Password Reset
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name}, Your NCR SalesCentral login and password information can be found below. Please use the following URL to connect to your NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal: http://nscportal.ncr.com
If you continue to have problems please contact your Channel Account Manager for further assistance.
Thanks, NCR Channel Support Team
